attributes.action: Stop daily car parking charges in Sutton Park
attributes.additional_details:
The local Council are currently debating whether to start charging £2 a day, every day, for car parking in Sutton Park, Sutton Coldfield, West Midlands.

We need to act now and tell them we are all against this proposal.

The Government recommend people should exercise more but this charge will stop people using the park or they will park in  the surrounding streets causing congestion.

Our lovely, beautiful park should be free for all to enjoy.  We need to stop this before its too late for future generations.

We urge the Government/Council to reconsider and listen to the local people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
